entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grande Cache
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.8°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
